name: Trainer 1
Dialogue: Suspicious men are in the cave. What about you?

name: Trainer 1 after
Dialogue: I saw them! I'm sure they're from TEAM ROCKET!

name: Trainer 2
Dialogue: What? I'm waiting for my friends to find me here.

name: Trainer 2 after
Dialogue: I heard there are some very rare fossils here.

name: Trainer 3
Dialogue: What! Don't sneak up on me!

name: Trainer 3 after
Dialogue: I have to find stronger POKEMON.

name: Trainer 4
Dialogue: Go through this cave to get to CERULEAN CITY!

name: Trainer 4 after
Dialogue: ZUBAT is tough! But, it can be useful if you catch one.

name: Trainer 5
Dialogue: Wow! It's way bigger in here than I thought!

name: Trainer 5 after
Dialogue: How do you get out of here?

name: Trainer 6
Dialogue: Did you come to explore too?

name: Trainer 6 after
Dialogue: I came down here to show off to girls.

name: Trainer 7
Dialogue: WHOA! You shocked me! Oh, you're just a kid!

name: Trainer 7 after
Dialogue: Kids like you shouldn't be here!

name: Trainer 8
Dialogue: We, TEAM ROCKET, are POKEMON gangsters!

name: Trainer 8 after
Dialogue: Darn it all! My associates won't stand for this!

name: Trainer 9
Dialogue: We're pulling a big job here! Get lost, kid!

name: Trainer 9 after
Dialogue: If you find a fossil, give it to me and scram!

name: Trainer 10
Dialogue: Little kids should leave grown-ups alone!

name: Trainer 10 after
Dialogue: POKEMON lived here long before people came.

name: Trainer 11
Dialogue: TEAM ROCKET will find the fossils, revive and sell them for cash!

name: Trainer 11 after
Dialogue: You made me mad! TEAM ROCKET will blacklist you!

name: Trainer 12
Dialogue: Hey, stop! I found these fossils! They're both mine!

name: Trainer 12 after
Dialogue: We'll each take one! No being greedy!
All right. Then this is mine!
Far away, on CINNABAR ISLAND, there's a POKEMON LAB. They do research on regenerating fossils.
